vlive.korean: 호날두를 염두에 두시고 지어냈다는 썰이 있는데 맞나요? Did you say it thinking Ronaldo? 듣기 View video PENTAGON : 릴레이 V LIVE : Ballad Unit
vlive.english: Did you say it thinking Ronaldo?

vlive.korean: 그러니까 4주를 할지 6주... - 이미 염두에 두고 계세요 나윤 양? I don't know if it's 4 weeks or 6... - Do you already have something in mind? 듣기 View video MOMOLAND : [Replay] 모모랜드 5집 미니앨범 'Show Me' 컴백 쇼케이스 (MOMOLAND's 5th Mini Album 'Show Me' Comeback Showcase)
vlive.english: I don't know if it's 4 weeks or 6... - Do you already have something in mind?

vlive.korean: 혹시 염두에 둔 게 있으신지 여쭤볼게요. I'd like to ask if there's something you have in mind. 듣기 View video V DRAMA : [Full]서른이지만 열일곱입니다 X 앞터V (30 but 17 X Early Interview)
vlive.english: I'd like to ask if there's something you have in mind.

vlive.korean: 제가 편집하면서도 그런 걸 많이 염두해 두고 제가 그러한 만큼... I placed a lot of emphasis on that when I was editing as well. 듣기 View video KBS예능 : 모모문고에 여자친구가?! 기자간담회 현장 라이브 / MOMOBOOKS with GFRIEND-Press Conference V Live
vlive.english: I placed a lot of emphasis on that when I was editing as well.

vlive.korean: 잘 염두에 두고 만드시거든요. as a whole. 듣기 View video B1A4 : 신우의 어메이징 라디오

examples.korean: mindful of our responsibilities 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리의 책무를 염두에 둔 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Do you have anyone in mind for this job? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 자리에 대해 누구 염두에 두고 있는 사람 있으세요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Do you have anyone in mind for this job? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This vehicle is made with aerodynamicy in mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 자동차는 공기역학적 형태를 염두에 두고 만들어졌다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: This vehicle is made with aerodynamicy in mind. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In case you forgot, remember that the consequences of a delay would be devastating for the company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 혹시나 잊으셨는지 모르겠지만, 지연에 따른 결과가 회사에는 치명적일 수 있음을 염두에 두십시오. DARAKWON
examples.english: In case you forgot, remember that the consequences of a delay would be devastating for the company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The writer wrote the story with multi-publishing in mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 작가는 다채널 출판을 염두에 두고 이야기를 집필했다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
